name: Interview with the Whisperer
description:
A short game about a journalist who travels into the Galician countryside to interview an old man who claims to have built a radio that allows him to speak with God.

Interview with the Whisperer is an experimental conversational adventure that makes use of Chatbot technology to convert whatever you write into something that the game character may or may not understand. Do your best to draw as much information as you can out of Manuel. You may need to be perseverant since he has a bit of trouble following conversations!
